p: Quantity and quality have always been the primary foci in the field of agriculture. The governing of these attributes is anticipated to be more crucial in the upcoming years. This prediction is based on the constant increase in global population as well as heightened expectations for healthy food sources. However, the agricultural field faces great pressure under globalization. The transformation of the global economic landscape makes agricultural activities seem less profitable in contrast to other industrial activities. The outflow of the workforce makes it increasingly expensive and difficult to meet the demands of agricultural activities.
